name: dining room

item_setup_dict.wall mount: WALL MOUNT are along the WEST wall

short_description: You are in the dining room.
long_description: The dining room is furnished with a table large enough to fit twelve people and a large CHINA CABINET full of delicate, ornate dinnerware against the WEST wall. To the side of the cabinet, you see a 4 hook WALL MOUNT.  You imagine stuffy business meetings are the most common dinner parties, but it would be a lovely room for family and friends to share a meal.  Thereâ€™s a door in the SOUTH wall to the LIVING ROOM and another in the EAST wall goes to the KITCHEN.
